Toyin Afolayan (A mụrụ ya n'ụbọchị iri abụọ na anọ nke ọnwa Septemba n'afọ1959) nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Lola Idije bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri. Ọ nwetara nkwado mgbe ọ pụtara dị ka Madam Adisa na ihe nkiri n'afọ1995 akpọrọ Deadly Affair
A maara Toyin Afolayan dị ka onye malitere okwu ịntanetị a ma ama Soro Soke werey na Pele My Dear
Soro Soke Werey bụ okwu ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe #EndSars na Naijiria ji mee ihe iji chọọ ka Gọọmentị kwuo okwu ma mee ka ha kwuo okwu n'elu ihe ndị uwe ojii SARS na mba ahụ.
